Hey TurboTax, I went and watched all the other ads you have on your channel that are trying to be "cute" or funny and honestly, they can't even touch this one.  If I were you, I'd delete them all and make as many different commercials of this bear busting the moves that you can.  And the person who came up with this ad, isn't getting paid nearly enough because because of this little bear, TurboTax is going to be the company on everyone's lips this year come tax time and you're gonna make a killing.  Btw, get to work on making these little guys for people to buy.  And please, please, stop making weird gruesome vids of people getting impaled by fish, crushed by cars, killed by machines and chemicals, and falling off of cruise ships.  The punchline isn't nearly worth the cost.  But tiny dancing knit bears?  I think you struck gold with that one. ğŸ˜‰

I couldn't find the commercial from your recent campaign with the guy getting impaled by a swordfish / marlin, but I wanted you to know that my best friend lost his brother to a fishing accident where he was impaled by a swordfish.  Having that commercial come on TV while hanging out with him, I could literally watch his heart break from across the room.  You might as well depict someone with a gaping gunshot wound in their head laughing about their taxes and show it to a bunch of vets.  Really poor taste.  I didn't know how else to get in touch with you advertising department, and I'm not usually the kind of person to be offended by anything, but that's really crass.  Made me decide to do my own taxes this year.
